solution_line_template: In the first round, Lorelei did {lorelei_fraction_round1} * {hattie_jumps_round1} jumps = <<{lorelei_fraction_round1}*{hattie_jumps_round1}={lorelei_jumps_round1}>>{lorelei_jumps_round1} jumps.
In the second round, Hattie did {hattie_fraction_round2} * {hattie_jumps_round1} jumps = <<{hattie_fraction_round2}*{hattie_jumps_round1}={hattie_jumps_round2}>>{hattie_jumps_round2} jumps, while

The total number of jumps for the two in both rounds is {lorelei_jumps_round2} jumps + {hattie_jumps_round2} jumps + {lorelei_jumps_round1} jumps + {hattie_jumps_round1} jumps = <<{lorelei_jumps_round2}+{hattie_jumps_round2}+{lorelei_jumps_round1}+{hattie_jumps_round1}={total_jumps}>>{total_jumps} jumps
